main event: A civilian observed a bright, round, metallic object hovering in the sky on September 17, 1966.
interesting points: The object changed colors from red and green lights during the observation., The object was about 30-40 feet in diameter and remained stationary for 2-3 minutes before moving in a zigzag pattern., The witness stated that the object was silent and much brighter than any stars in the night sky., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes before the object shot off rapidly to the southwest., The witness was unable to capture any photographs as the object disappeared while he was retrieving a camera.
